titles.title: To require a demonstration program on the accession as Air Force officers of candidates with auditory impairments.
Keith Nolan Air Force Deaf Demonstration Act of 2018
Keith Nolan Air Force Deaf Demonstration Act of 2018
Keith Nolan Air Force Deaf Demonstration Act of 2018

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Personnel.

bill.summary:
Keith Nolan Air Force Deaf Demonstration Act of 2018
This bill requires the U.S. Air Force to (1) carry out a demonstration program assessing the advisability of permitting individuals with auditory impairments to act as officers, and (2) report to Congress as to the program's outcome.
